questions.quote: Seth, it's me. What's more important than catching up with an old college buddy?
Well, I guess he figured you just wouldn't care. It *has* been a few years.
Man, I don't understand people. I mean, why would George want to deprive you of pleasure? Is it just me?
Well here's your chance to try the opposite. Instead of tuna salad and being intimidated by women, chicken salad and going right up to them.
No, not billiard..  Not billiards.. it was.. Come on, already. Come on..
That's fine. If you just give me my duck money, I'll be on my way.
The reverse peepholes. Silvio said I'm an agitator and I'm out of the building.
You know, you have the slowest elevator in the entire city? That's hard to get used to when you're in so many other fast ones.
Right. He cooks my food, he cleans my house, he does all my shopping for me. And there you go, that's your program.
Yeah, I gotta tell Jerry we're here. I gotta go to the bathroom.
